title: Package Receiving, Walk-In Closets*, Play Park, New Pool Lounge Area
posting_body: ['Retreat at Sweetwater', '3355 Sweetwater Rd, Lawrenceville, GA, 30044', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 60', 'OR Text', '60', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'WELCOME HOME', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1102 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'With premium finishes and wide-open spaces, each newly renovated floor plan from Retreat at Sweetwater brings you unparalleled luxury without sacrificing on comfort.', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Pet Monthly Rent Max: $20', 'Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 pet fee (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $20 per month.', 'Aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our leasing office for our pet policy.', 'Pet Rent Basis: Per Home', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Policy Fee Min/Max: $300 - $600', 'Income Requirements:', 'Require 3x the monthly rent and must show proof of income.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'wXgcl1F0c8K4']
